type.name: org.gradle.tooling.events.test.TestFinishEvent
type.description: * An event that informs about a test having finished its execution. You can query the result of the * test using {@link #getResult()}. * * @since 2.4

method.name: getResult
method.description:
* Returns the result of the finished test operation. Currently, the result will be one of the following * sub-types: * *
    *
  • {@link TestSuccessResult}
    • *
  • {@link TestSkippedResult}
    • *
  • {@link TestFailureResult}
    • *
* * @return the result of the finished test operation

property.name: result
property.description:
* Returns the result of the finished test operation. Currently, the result will be one of the following * sub-types: * *
    *
  • {@link TestSuccessResult}
    • *
  • {@link TestSkippedResult}
    • *
  • {@link TestFailureResult}
    • *
* * @return the result of the finished test operation
